card.name: Zarax Broodqueen
card.text: Flying, vigilance {1}{W}, {T}: Create a token that's a copy of another target creature you control, except it's a 1/1.

card.name: Enter the Era of Stars
card.text: If you haven't cast a spell named Enter the Era of Stars this game, for the rest of the game, spells you cast have affinity for artifacts. (They cost {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.) Take an extra turn after this one. Exile Enter the Era of Stars.

card.name: Sirocco Cruiser
card.text: Flying Whenever an opponent draws a card, create two Junk tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.")

card.name: The Black Mask
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a shadow counter on up to one target creature. (A creature with shadow can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) Whenever a creature with shadow dies, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Wreckage Ravager
card.text: Flying, haste Whenever Wreckage Ravager attacks or becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, create a Junk token. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.")

card.name: Sigrid, the Golden Gunmaiden
card.text: [+2]: You get an emblem with "If a red or colorless source you control would deal damage to an opponent or a permanent an opponent controls, it deals that much damage plus 1 instead." [0]: Sigrid deals 3 damage to any target. [-3]: Choose up to one target instant card and up to one target sorcery card in your graveyard. An opponent chooses one of them. Return that card to your hand, then you may cast the other without paying its mana cost. If a card cast this way would be put into your graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Skinshifting Puma
card.text: Deathtouch Opponents can't target Skinshifting Puma with the first spell they cast each turn. Provision: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Skinshifting Puma this turn. (To provision, pay {3} or sacrifice a nonland permanent with mana value 1 or less.)

card.name: Roaming Cactegu
card.text: Vigilance {T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color. Frontier — As long as there are four or more land types among lands you control and Roaming Cactegu is in your library or graveyard, it's a Desert Forest land in addition to its other types.

card.name: Evolution Event
card.text: Sacrifice any number of creatures. For each creature sacrificed this way, search your library for a creature card with mana value less than or equal to 2 plus the sacrificed creature's mana value and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle.

card.name: Xylo, the Starfallen
card.text: As Xylo enters, exile from your hand and/or graveyard a white or blue card with mana value 1, a white or blue card with mana value 2 or 3, and a white or blue card with mana value 5 or greater. [+1]: You may cast a copy of a card exiled with Xylo with mana value 1 without paying its mana cost. [-2]: You may cast a copy of a card exiled with Xylo with mana value 2 or 3 without paying its mana cost. [-6]: You may cast a copy of a card exiled with Xylo with mana value 5 or greater without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Eli, Wistful Drifter
card.text: Whenever you activate a loyalty ability of Eli, you may sacrifice an artifact. When you do, put a loyalty counter on Eli, then he deals 1 damage to any target. [0]: Mill two cards, then you may return a nonland permanent card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to your hand. [-2]: Eli deals 3 damage to any target if that target was dealt damage this turn. You gain 3 life.

card.name: Interstellar Realignment
card.text: Exile up to one target nonland permanent. Ricochet (Cast one side from your hand, then exile it. Cast the other for free at your next upkeep.)

card.name: The Blood Meridian
card.text: All spells have "As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a nonlegendary permanent." {3}{B}{B}{R}{R}, Sacrifice The Blood Meridian: Each player's life total becomes 1.

card.name: Rusty, Sidewinders Brass
card.text: [+1]: Create a Junk token. [-3]: You may provision. When you do, search your library for a creature card with mana value 4 or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. (To provision, pay {3} or sacrifice a nonland permanent with mana value 1 or less.) [-6]: You get an emblem with "Whenever you sacrifice a nonland permanent, each other player sacrifices a nonland permanent."

card.name: Stalker of the Bogs
card.text: Trample When Stalker of the Bogs enters, if you cast it, target opponent reveals their hand. Choose a nonland card with mana value 3 or less from it. That player exiles the chosen card, then draws a card. You may cast the exiled card.

card.name: Amelia Hawkeye Hayes
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, arm target creature you control. Then if it's equipped twice, it gains indestructible until end of turn. (Create a colorless Equipment artifact token with "Equipped creature gets +1/+0" and equip {2} attached to it.) Whenever Amelia attacks, she deals damage to any target equal to the number of Equipments attached to attacking creatures you control. You gain that much life.

card.name: The Twilight Riders
card.text: Triple strike (This creature deals first-strike, regular, and last-strike combat damage.) Deadeye — {3}: Untap up to three target creatures you control. After this combat phase, there is an additional combat phase. (The first time this deals combat damage to a player each turn, you may activate this ability. It costs {0} if this is equipped.)

card.name: The Starholme Frontier
card.text: When The Starholme Frontier enters, if you cast it, shuffle your hand and graveyard into your library, then create seven Junk tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.") Frontier — Once each turn, if there are four or more land types among lands you control, you may cast a creature spell without paying its mana cost.

card.name: The Apocalypse Dial
card.text: {T}, Pay 2 life: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one into your hand and exile the other. Then if you have exactly 14 life and you both own and control The Apocalypse Dial and an artifact named The Apocalypse Pendulum, exile them, then meld them into Azumoth, the Apocalypse. --- (Back): Azumoth, the Apocalypse

card.name: Azumoth, the Apocalypse
card.text: Vigilance When Azumoth enters, exile any number of target nonland permanents with total mana value 14 or less. At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, that player chooses draw step, main phase, or combat phase. If they would take a step or phase of that type this turn, you take a step or phase of that type instead. --- (Front): The Apocalypse Dial

card.name: The Smoking Gun
card.text: [+1]: Create a colorless Bullet artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: It deals 1 damage to any target." [0]: Until end of turn, target noncreature artifact you control becomes a 4/4 artifact creature. The next time you would activate an ability of that artifact this turn, if it's tapped, you may pay {0} rather than pay that ability's costs. [-6]: Exile each permanent that's one or more colors.

card.name: Drifting Moon
card.text: Flying Whenever a triggered ability of a nonland permanent an opponent controls triggers, draw a card unless that player pays {1}. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Opportune Musketeer
card.text: When Opportune Musketeer enters, search your library for an Equipment card with mana value 3 or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Deadeye — {W}: Each player draws a card. (The first time this deals combat damage to a player each turn, you may activate this ability. It costs {0} if this is equipped.)

card.name: Annie White Rose Harper
card.text: Vigilance When Annie enters, create Scooter, a legendary 2/1 white Dog creature token with "This creature has indestructible during your turn as long as you control a Human." Whenever Annie and at least three other creatures attack, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Procession of the Alliance
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, provision. (To provision, pay {3} or sacrifice a nonland permanent with mana value 1 or less.) Look at the top ten cards of your library. For each mana value 1, 2, and 3, you may put a creature card with that mana value from among the revealed cards onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Sunset Over Pike's Chapel
card.text: When Sunset Over Pike's Chapel enters, you gain 5 life. Each player who cast a spell this turn can't attack, and each player who attacked this turn can't cast spells.

card.name: Blessing of the Twin Suns
card.text: Until your next turn, target permanent you control gains protection from everything. (It can't be targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything.) Ricochet (Cast one side from your hand, then exile it. Cast the other for free at your next upkeep.)

card.name: Jack Flash Jacobs
card.text: Flash When Jack enters, exile target spell. When Jack is no longer on the battlefield, return the exiled card to its owner's hand. Deadeye — {4}{U}{U}: You may cast a card exiled with Jack without paying its mana cost. (The first time this deals combat damage to a player each turn, you may activate this ability. It costs {0} if this is equipped.)

card.name: Shadow Puppeteer
card.text: Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.) Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may return another creature you control to its owner's hand. If that spell has mana value 5 or greater, create a token that's a copy of that creature.

card.name: Aione, the First Galaxian
card.text: When Aione enters, create a 3/3 colorless Vehicle artifact token with flying and crew 2. (It has "Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.") Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Lunar Fallout
card.text: Creature spells you cast cost {2} less to cast. If a creature would enter under your control and you cast it, instead it enters as a noncreature artifact with "{2}: This artifact becomes a creature and loses this ability."

card.name: Canyon Maraterra
card.text: Flying This spell can't be countered. At the beginning of your end step, untap up to four lands with different land types. Frontier — Whenever Canyon Maraterra attacks, if there are four or more land types among lands you control, draw cards until you have four cards in your hand.

card.name: Ad Astra
card.text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put two into your hand and the rest on the bottom in any order, then discard a card. Ricochet (Cast one side from your hand, then exile it. Cast the other for free at your next upkeep.)

card.name: Nox, the Graven Gunman
card.text: When Nox enters, if you cast him, arm him. (Create a colorless Equipment artifact token with "Equipped creature gets +1/+0" and equip {2} attached to it.) Equipments stay attached to Nox as he moves to any zone other than a player's hand or library. {1}{B}, Sacrifice an Equipment attached to Nox: Return him from your graveyard to the battlefield. He can't block this turn.

card.name: Shadowband Posse
card.text: Menace, deathtouch Deadeye — {1}{B}, Sacrifice another creature: Draw two cards and you lose 2 life. (The first time this deals combat damage to a player each turn, you may activate this ability. It costs {0} if this is equipped.)

card.name: Debt Collectors

Vigilance Frontier — Whenever an opponent casts a noncreature spell, if there are four or more land types among lands you control, you may have Scourge of Devil's Spine fight target creature that player controls. If they control no creatures, draw a card instead.

card.name: Where the Wild Things Are

card.name: Cross the Verge

card.name: Cloudbreacher Oktujo
Cut from the Same Cloth

card.text: Arm target creature you control. It gains first strike and trample until end of turn. (Create a colorless Equipment artifact token with "Equipped creature gets +1/+0" and equip {2} attached to it.)
